snippet.title: Purchasing Agent (OA) ZS-1105-IV (GS-7/8 equivalent)
snippet.description: ...involving specialized or commercial requirements having unstable price or product characteristics, with supervisory review of awards...your initial rating in one of three pre-defined categories " gold," "silver," and "bronze." Within each category, those eligible...

snippet.title: Supervisory General Engineer, ZP-0801-V
snippet.description: ...will be assigned to one of the following quality categories: Gold, Silver, or Bronze. Candidates in the highest quality category...assessing shipyard design and construction efforts to include price, performance, and schedule; and planning, developing, and executing...
